review: It definetely needs some getting used to from the epic original The Binding of Isaac but nonetheless... This is an epic upgrade on visuals and on the game engine itself - I have been able to run the game much longer than the original without performance issues and a solid fps! :D

review: This is a nice MOAB game.I prefer it to LoL for it's originality and interface but that is just my personal opinion.I highly recommend this game!
